text: Sims Place Terminal is one of just two roadside bus terminals left in Singapore,the other one being Ghim Moh Terminal. 3 bus services serve the Terminal most of them going to destinations on the east side of Singapore. There is a hawker centre at the vicinity of the terminal. Nearest MRT station is Aljunied which is walkable

It is a bit plain.(-1 star)
No shops near by.(-1 star)
At least there is information counter.
Late and changing arrival time always
